<?php
/*
Plugin Name: Header Search Field
Description: Adds a search field to the header area of the website.
*/

// register our form css
function wpse_register_header_search_css() {
    wp_enqueue_style( 'header-search', plugins_url( 'style.css', __FILE__ ) );
}
add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', 'wpse_register_header_search_css' );

// add the search form
function wpse_add_header_search_form() {
    ?>
    <form role="search" method="get" class="header-search-form" action="<?php echo esc_url( home_url( '/' ) ); ?>">
        <label>
            <span class="screen-reader-text"><?php echo _x( 'Search for:', 'label' ) ?></span>
            <input type="search" class="header-search-field" placeholder="<?php echo esc_attr_x( 'Search …', 'placeholder') ?>" value="<?php echo get_search_query() ?>" name="s" title="<?php echo esc_attr_x( 'Search for:', 'label' ) ?>" />
            <input type="submit" class="header-search-submit" value="<?php echo esc_attr_x( 'Search', 'submit button' ) ?>" />
        </label>
    </form>
    <?php
}
add_action( 'wp_footer', 'wpse_add_header_search_form' );
